Amobeous/Ramhorn/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Koga Shuko:



Amobeous looked to Bacterium, then to Ramhorn.  "Get out of here, quick!" he 
yelled, slamming Ramhorn into a wall, punching him quickly, knocking the 
Maximal out, heading for the exit.

====

Double Punch, Injector, and Manterror looked to Hell Beast.  "We require 
orders, sir."

====

Koga Shuko looks to Defection. "No...I don't want the Ark destroyed.  Begin 
repairs.  He said, pointing to the only damage, a large hole in the 'cieling' 
of Koga Shuko and Set's ship.
